text: English invasion of Scotland may refer to: * English invasion of Scotland (1296), by Edward I of England * English invasion of Scotland (1298), by Edward I of England * English invasion of Scotland (1300), by Edward I of England * English invasion of Scotland (1385), by Richard II of England * English invasion of Scotland (1400), by Henry IV of England * English invasion of Scotland (1482), by Alexander Stewart, Duke of Albany and brother of James III of Scotland * English invasions of Scotland, a list of historical battles ==See also== * Scottish invasion of England, a list of historical battles
title: English invasion of Scotland (disambiguation)
